title: See Something Say Something
subtitle: A public safety social media campaign for the 2016 Boston Marathon

paragraphs: I designed this set of graphics to highlight the 4 suspicious activies that MEMA and the state police department has outlined. The design uses the combination of line art and sillouette to illustrate each warning in a senario and uses a color pallete with stark contrast to creat an alarming call to action.

These graphics were promoted via MEMA, state police, and mass.gov official social media channels citing the See Something Say Something campaign by the Homeland security during the 2016 Boston Marathon.
